group.item: Keep criminals and graffiti off the streets.
Buy decorations to beautify your town.
Buy plants to make your town greener.
Buy houses for families to fight and sleep in.
Buy decorations for people to look at while waiting in line for rides.
Buy food stalls to give people energy to get back in line for rides.
Buy rides that people will line up for.
Buy stores that sell souvenirs of a day spent waiting in line for rides.
Buy restaurants for people too lazy to cook.
Buy public buildings to keep society docile.
Buy stores to get suckers to drop dough.
